contentrichtext.text: This is a list of '''[[river]]s'', ''[[creek (stream)|creek]]s''', and '''[[stream]]s''' in the province of [[Manitoba]], [[Canada]]. ==Watersheds== The entire province of Manitoba is within the [[List of Hudson Bay rivers|Hudson Bay drainage basin]]: *[[Nelson River]] **[[Lake Winnipeg]] watershed ***[[Winnipeg River]] ***[[Red River of the North|Red River]] ****[[Assiniboine River]] *****[[Qu'Appelle River]] *****[[Souris River]] ***[[Saskatchewan River]] ****[[Lake Winnipegosis]] watershed ==List of rivers== *[[Antler River]] *[[Assiniboine River]]
